title: Crowd cheered 'Bobby' after Trump mentioned RFK Jr. | Fact check
shortDescription: The crowd didn't chant "Modi" during Trump's speech declaring victory in the Nov. 5 election. It cheered "Bobby," a nickname for Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

title: Biden, Harris observe Veterans Day
shortDescription: President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris participated in a Veterans Day ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery.

title: Election recount? Harris fundraiser donations to be used for effort
shortDescription: A portion of donations made to the Harris Victory Fund will be directed towards a recount effort, according to its fundraising page.

title: When will 2024 election results be certified? Deadline for each state
shortDescription: Inauguration Day is Jan. 20, 2025, but between now and then states will be certifying election results.

title: Trump taps Stephen Miller as deputy chief of staff for policy
shortDescription: Miller was the architect of Trump's hardline first-term immigration politics. His job comes before key Cabinet roles, including Treasury and Defense.

title: Kremlin denies Trump and Putin spoke after election
shortDescription: The Kremlin denied reports by Reuters and others that Russian President Vladimir Putin spoke by phone with U.S. president-elect Donald Trump in recent days.

title: Latest on Trump Cabinet picks: Tom Homan, Rep. Stefanik earn roles
shortDescription: More roles for Trump's administration have emerged: Elise Stefanik as UN ambassador, Tom Homan as "border czar," and Stephen Miller as deputy chief of staff.

title: ACLU sues to extend ballot curing deadline in Arizona
shortDescription: The ACLU of Arizona is filing a lawsuit to extend the deadline for curing ballots, especially for voters to respond to problems with their mail-in ballot signatures.

title: Trump picks Homan as border czar, Stefanik to lead UN: Live coverage
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has started to make some of the pivotal picks for his second administration after swiftly winning the 2024 presidential election.

title: Trump picks major House ally Elise Stefanik to be next UN ambassador
shortDescription: The president-elect is beginning to name cabinet members for his second term.

title: Tom Homan chosen as 'border czar' to oversee deportations: Trump
shortDescription: Tom Homan, who oversaw contentious immigration policies during Donald Trump's first administration, will become 'border czar' overseeing deportations.

title: Trump names Tom Homan 'border czar'
shortDescription: Donald Trump said Tom Homan will take the position of 'border czar.' Homan directed ICE under the previous Trump administration.

title: Trump advised Putin not to escalate war with Ukraine
shortDescription: President-elect Trump has criticized the scale of U.S. military and financial support for Ukraine, vowing to end the war quickly, without saying how.

title: Former Harris aide says Biden should resign so she can serve as president
shortDescription: Former Harris communications director Jamal Simmons said on CNN that Joe Biden could step down, allowing Kamala Harris to serve as the 47th president.

title: Trump Cabinet picks: Latest on who could fill key positions
shortDescription: With Donald Trump headed back to the White House, he has a few months to build his next administration. After picking his chief of staff, who's next?

title: Charlamagne tha God says Trump won 'dinner table issues' in 2024 election
shortDescription: "I do believe in the future of this country because I have no choice but to," radio host Charlamagne tha God said in a new interview.

title: What's at stake for the GOP to keep the House for Donald Trump's second term
shortDescription: Republicans are likely to keep the chamber. But if Democrats flip it, the next two years will be marked by opposition.
